NAME: Sum
DESCRIPTION: Function to sum an array. Can be used with initial value.

NAME: Deltas
DESCRIPTION: Function to find the differences between members of an array. Comes in various flavors.

NAME: Rotate 90 degrees left
DESCRIPTION: Function which rotates a matrix 90 degrees left(counterclockwise).

NAME: Set Union
DESCRIPTION: Set Union: Keep unique elements from both arrays

NAME: Set Intersection
DESCRIPTION: Set Intersection: common elements from both arrays

NAME: Rotate left
DESCRIPTION: Rotate A by Is elements to the left

NAME: Uppercase
DESCRIPTION: Upper case of all alphabetic chars

NAME: Update
DESCRIPTION: Update value at x[i] with v

NAME: Delete
DESCRIPTION: Delete from table is reverse select

NAME: Max, Any
DESCRIPTION: Get the maximum of an array/are any elements 1?

NAME: Min, All
DESCRIPTION: Get the minimum of an array/are all elements 1?

NAME: Square Root
DESCRIPTION: Floating point square root of a number

NAME: enum, odometer
DESCRIPTION: Range/generalized range from 0 to I-1 inclusive

NAME: where
DESCRIPTION: Where: repeat index of value by value

NAME: deepwhere
DESCRIPTION: Repeat multidimensional index of value by value

NAME: ascend
DESCRIPTION: Grade Up: Indices to sort ascending

NAME: descend
DESCRIPTION: Grade Down: Indices to sort descending

NAME: open
DESCRIPTION: Open a file, return tie number

NAME: close
DESCRIPTION: Close a file by tie number

NAME: not
DESCRIPTION: Boolean not: true if 0, false otherwise

NAME: fill
DESCRIPTION: Fill in x at null atoms in y

NAME: without
DESCRIPTION: Set difference: remove elements in y from x

NAME: replicate
DESCRIPTION: Filter: Apply function to list, filter list using Where

NAME: drop
DESCRIPTION: Drop x elements from the beginning of y

NAME: cut
DESCRIPTION: Cut y at indices in x

NAME: weed
DESCRIPTION: Filter false: Filter, but keep values that are at zeroes

NAME: delete
DESCRIPTION: Delete element at index y from x

NAME: pad
DESCRIPTION: Pad string with spaces to length x

NAME: cast
DESCRIPTION: Cast to type based on symbol(s) in x

NAME: find
DESCRIPTION: find elements of y in x

NAME: deal
DESCRIPTION: Randomly choose x elements from y
